title: Little Girl Lost
description: This journal may be triggering to some readers. Proceed at your own discretion! This journal depicts scenes of an adult nature, specifically recollections of sexual and physical trauma, as well as heavy drug abuse.The story that follows is a true account of one woman's experiences with abandonment, physical and emotional abuse, incest, rape, domestic violence, and drug addiction. The emotional scars still linger, and she struggles with her demons as she searches for a way to get through each day....This is her journal.The publisher has made available an email address at which you may contact the author. All emails are screened and there is no guarantee of a reply, however all correspondence will be read. You may write littlegirllost.author@yahoo.com
author: Anonymous
